channel.title: Legal on RCT

item.title: Legal and Finance
item.description: Real Charitable Trust is a registered public charitable trust, and we are administered by a board responsible for strategy, policy, budgets and results, who ensure that the organization complies with rules and regulations. On this page, you will find information regarding the legal status of Real Charitable Trust. The registered office of Real Charitable Trust is in Chennai, TN with field & project offices in eight locations in three districts of Tamil Nadu, namely Chennai, Kancheepuram and Thiruvallur district.
